verses.verse: Now those that sealed <S%H2856><s%> were, Nehemiah, <S%H5166><s%> the Tirshatha, <S%H8660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hachaliah, <S%H2446><s%> and Zidkijah, <S%H6667><s%>
Maaziah, <S%H4590><s%> Bilgai, <S%H1084><s%> Shemaiah: <S%H8098><s%> these <S%H428><s%> were the priests. <S%H3548><s%>
And the Levites: <S%H3881><s%> both Jeshua <S%H3442><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaniah, <S%H245><s%> Binnui <S%H1131><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad, <S%H2582><s%> Kadmiel; <S%H6934><s%>
And their brothers, <S%H251><s%> Shebaniah, <S%H7645><s%> Hodijah, <S%H1940><s%> Kelita, <S%H7042><s%> Pelaiah, <S%H6411><s%> Hanan, <S%H2605><s%>
The chief <S%H7218><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> Parosh, <S%H6551><s%> Pahathmoab, <S%H6355><s%> Elam, <S%H5867><s%> Zatthu, <S%H2240><s%> Bani, <S%H1137><s%>

And the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> the porters, <S%H7778><s%> the singers, <S%H7891><s%> the Nethinims, <S%H5411><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> they that had separated <S%H914><s%> themselves from the people <S%H5971><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%> to the law <S%H8451><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> their wives, <S%H802><s%> their sons, <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters, <S%H1323><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one having knowledge, <S%H3045><s%> and having understanding; <S%H995><s%>

They joined <S%H2388><s%> to their brothers, <S%H251><s%> their nobles, <S%H117><s%> and entered <S%H935><s%> into a curse, <S%H423><s%> and into an oath, <S%H7621><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in God's <S%H430><s%> law, <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> by Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and to observe <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our Lord, <S%H113><s%> and his judgments <S%H4941><s%> and his statutes; <S%H2706><s%>

And that we would not give <S%H5414><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> for our sons: <S%H1121><s%>

And if the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> ware <S%H4728><s%> or any victuals <S%H7668><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to sell, <S%H4376><s%> that we would not buy <S%H3947><s%> it of them on the sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> or on the holy <S%H6944><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> and that we would leave <S%H5203><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and the exaction <S%H4855><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> debt. <S%H3027><s%>

Also we made <S%H5975><s%> ordinances <S%H4687><s%> for us, to charge <S%H5414><s%> ourselves yearly <S%H8141><s%> with the third <S%H7992><s%> part of a shekel <S%H8255><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God; <S%H430><s%>

For the show bread, <S%H3899><s%> <S%H4635><s%> and for the continual <S%H8548><s%> meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and for the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, of the sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> of the new <S%H2320><s%> moons, <S%H2320><s%> for the set <S%H4150><s%> feasts, <S%H4150><s%> and for the holy <S%H6944><s%> things, and for the sin <S%H2403><s%> offerings to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

And we cast <S%H5307><s%> the lots <S%H1486><s%> among the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and the people, <S%H5971><s%> for the wood <S%H6086><s%> offering, <S%H7133><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> it into the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> after the houses <S%H1004><s%> of our fathers, <S%H1><s%> at times <S%H6256><s%> appointed <S%H2163><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> by year, <S%H8141><s%> to burn <S%H1197><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law: <S%H8451><s%>

And to bring <S%H935><s%> the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of our ground, <S%H127><s%> and the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> by year, <S%H8141><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Also the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of our sons, <S%H1121><s%> and of our cattle, <S%H929><s%> as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law, <S%H8451><s%> and the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> of our herds <S%H1241><s%> and of our flocks, <S%H6629><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> to the priests <S%H3548><s%> that minister <S%H8334><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God: <S%H430><s%>

And that we should bring <S%H935><s%> the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of our dough, <S%H6182><s%> and our offerings, <S%H8641><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> manner of trees, <S%H6086><s%> of wine <S%H8492><s%> and of oil, <S%H3323><s%> to the priests, <S%H3548><s%> to the chambers <S%H3957><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God; <S%H430><s%> and the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of our ground <S%H127><s%> to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> that the same <S%H1992><s%> Levites <S%H3881><s%> might have the tithes <S%H6237><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of our tillage. <S%H5656><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be with the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> when the Levites <S%H3881><s%> take tithes: <S%H6237><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall bring <S%H5927><s%> up the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of the tithes <S%H4643><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> to the chambers, <S%H3957><s%> into the treasure <S%H214><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> the offering <S%H8641><s%> of the corn, <S%H1715><s%> of the new <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> and the oil, <S%H3323><s%> to the chambers, <S%H3957><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> are the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> that minister, <S%H8334><s%> and the porters, <S%H7778><s%> and the singers: <S%H7891><s%> and we will not forsake <S%H5800><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>
